text: A song for the ascents.\f + \fr Ps 121 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm \f*
I lift up my eyes to the mountains;
He will not allow your foot to be moved;
he who protects you will not slumber.
Look, he will not slumber and he will not sleep—
Yahweh \add is\add* your shade at your right hand.
The sun will not strike you by day,
Yahweh will protect you from all evil;\f + \fr 121:7 \ft Or “all calamity” \f*
Yahweh will protect your going out and your coming in
